data: Skinner had inhabited the ironbound enclosure labeled “CASHIER” at McLaughlin & Perkins, Inc., so long, that the messenger boys had dubbed him the “cage man.”

Dodge, Henry Irving, 1861-1934; Wilson, F. Vaux (Francis Vaux), 1874-1938 [Illustrator]
